Name: Forgotten
About the game: Forgotten is an indie horror whit side view. The game has the atmosphere of a nightmare. The game will make you feel a shiver on your back. In the game you will play for a guy named Jerry, who had an accident, but after that, he ended up in an abandoned mansion. You need to escape from the mansion at any cost. Find different things, use them wisely. But sometimes the action may not be obvious. Survive or die . Co-op Also in the game there is a cooperative mode for 2 people , where you and your friend will have to find fuel cans to fill the car and leave the forest. it will be a difficult, scary but fun adventure Ð¡ooperative gameplay
